verses.roman:
keho kahe, kṛṣṇa kṣīroda-śāyī avatāra
asambhava nahe, satya vacana sabāra

synonyms: keho kahe—someone says; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kṣīroda-śāyī avatāra—an incarnation of Lord Viṣṇu lying in the ocean of milk; asambhava nahe—there is not impossibility; satya—true; vacana sabāra—everyone's statement.
translation: Some called Lord Kṛṣṇa an incarnation of Lord Kṣīrodakaśāyī. All these names are true; nothing is impossible.
